scripts.vercel-build: TEMP_URL=$DATABASE_URL && export DATABASE_URL=$(echo $TEMP_URL+'?pgbouncer=true&connect_timeout=10' | sed 's/.us-west/-pooler.us-west/') && export DIRECT_URL=$(echo $TEMP_URL+'?connect_timeout=10') && echo $DATABASE_URL && echo $DIRECT_URL && prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && next build
